articles.title: Google propels record Alphabet revenue, driving shares up 8%
articles.description: Shares of Alphabet rose 8.6% in after-hours trading, to $2,990.10, erasing their losses for the year-to-date. Shares of competitors in online ads including Facebook owner Meta Platforms Inc, Twitter Inc, Trade Desk Inc and Snap Inc all rose as well.

articles.title: Govt spending it right misses out on demand push

articles.description: Tamannaah Bhatia is one of the well-known faces in the South film industry. She is also one of the most stylish actresses down South. Her airport looks are always the talk of the town. On that note, check out some of her stylish airport looks.
articles.content: During one of her airport outings, Tamannaah was spotted wearing an all-black outfit consisting of black denim jeans, a low cut v-neck top and a monochrome long jacket.
